answers.answer: I do mine may 1st.... not looking forward to that!

Yikes i take mine next tuesday now im really not looking foward to this lol
I am almost 26 weeks, when does that test usually happen?
I did mine today.   I took the orange one.   It tasted like sunkist.    To me it just had a pure sugar after taste.  I thought it was gonna be worse.

everybody has different experiences with it. I wasn't looking forward to mine when I read all the stories on here, but when it came down to it, I didn't think it was that bad at all.  Gave me a little headache but that was it. I bet it has something to do with the different brands doctor office's use.
Bri1x  before your 25 weeks , and random0430 I had the same kind but it just burned my throat and made me feel  nasea I hated ever sip of the drink but Its for the baby so I suck it up and downed it
The test happens between 24-28 weeks.to me, it wasn't bad at all.The 3 hour test is way worse though.
I feel u just drank it I feel like I wana puke
Why do you have to take this test? What does it prove ?
It checks for gestational diabetes. I have mine April 23 for the 1 hour test!
I felt sooo sick after I drank it. I hated that. Thank god I passed.
